name: Secret Base
description:
The attack on a secret base hidden among old houses was unexpected. It looks like the mercenaries were preparing for a long time and carefully. The mercenaries were already near the secret laboratories. Most of the soldiers guarding the base were killed or wounded. Now you have to try very hard to destroy the invaders. Choose any weapon and use the ammunition of killed enemies.

I - Inventory

1,2,3-9 Quick weapon change

Download more games for free
